Verses: 1 pinpu Thaaveedhu: Naan Endha Naalilaakilum Orunaal Savulin Kaiyinaal Matindhupoven; Inich Chavul Isravelin Ellaikalil Engeyaavadhu Ennaik Kantupitikkalaam Enkira Nampikkai Atruppokumpatikkum, Naan Avan Kaikku Neengalaayirukkumpatikkum, Naan Pelisdharin Thesaththirkup Poi, Thappiththukkolvadhaippaarkkilum Nalamaana Kaariyam Verillai Endru Than Irudhayaththil Yosiththaan.
2 aakaiyaal Thaaveedhu Thannotirundha Arunooruperotungoota Ezhundhirundhu, Maayokin Kumaaranaakiya Aakis Ennum Kaaththin Raajaavinitaththil Poich Cherndhaan.

3 ange Thaaveedhum, Avan Manusharum, Avaravar Veettaarum, Thaaveedhotekoota Avan Irantu Manaivikalaakiya Yesrayel Ooraalaakiya Akinovaamum, Naapaalin Manaiviyaayirundha Karmel Ooraalaakiya Apikaayilum, Kaadhpattanaththil Aakeesitaththil Thangiyirundhaarkal.
4 thaaveedhu Kaadhpattanaththirku Otipponaan Endru Savulukku Arivikkappattapodhu, Avan Appuram Avanaith Thetavillai.

5 thaaveedhu Aakeesai Nokki: Ummutaiya Kankalil Enakkuth Thayaikitaikkumaanaal, Naan Vaasampannumpati Naattilulla Oorkalile Ondril Enakku Itandhaarum; Ummutaiya Atiyaan Ummotekoota Raajadhaani Pattanaththile Vaasamaayiruppaanen Endraan.
6 appozhudhu Aakees: Andraiya Thinam Siklaakai Avanukkuk Kotuththaan; Adhinimiththam Siklaak Innaal Varaikkum Yoodhaavin Raajaakkalaich Cherndhirukkiradhu.
7 thaaveedhu Pelisdharin Naattile Oru Varushamum Naalu Maadhamum Kutiyirundhaan.

8 angeyirundhu Thaaveedhum Avan Manusharum Kesooriyarmelum Kesriyar Melum Amalekkiyarmelum Pataiyetuththupponaarkal; Soorukkup Pokira Ellaidhuvakki Ekipdhudhesamattum Irukkira Naattile Poorvakaalam Thuvakkik Kutiyirundhavarkal Ivarkale.

9 thaaveedhu Andha Naattaik Kollaiyatikkirapodhu, Purusharkalaiyum Sdhireekalaiyum Uyirote Vaikkaamal, Aatu Maatukalaiyum Kazhudhaikalaiyum Ottakangalaiyum Vasdhirangalaiyum Etuththukkontu, Aakeesitaththukkuth Thirumpivaruvaan.
10 indru Eththisaiyil Poik Kollaiyatiththeerkal Endru Aakees Ketkumpodhu, Thaaveedhu: Yoodhaavutaiya Then Thisaiyilum Yeraamiyelarutaiya Then Thisaiyilum Keniyarutaiya Then Thisaiyilum Enpaan.

11 inna Innapati Thaaveedhu Seydhaan Endru Thangalukku Virodhamaana Seydhiyai Arivikkaththakka Oruvaraiyum Thaaveedhu Kaadhpattanaththirkuk Kontu Varaadhapatikku, Oru Purushanaiyaakilum Sdhireeyaiyaakilum Uyirote Vaikkaadhiruppaan; Avan Pelisdharin Naattup Puraththile Kutiyirukkira Naalellaam Ivvannam Seydhukontuvandhaan.
12 aakees Thaaveedhai Nampi: Avan Isravelaraakiya Thannutaiya Janangal Thannai Verukkumpati Seykiraan; Endraikkum Avan En Oozhiyakkaaranaayiruppaan Enpaan.
